overview: Doctor Simon and his research assistant, beautiful Liz Hollis are applying radical new technologies in psychotherapy. Simon is able to analyze people's dreams, altering them and re-orienting them, affecting their consciousness through their . Myra, in the middle of an ugly divorce, is scheming and dreaming all kinds of tawdry thoughts-filled with twisted eroticism and revenge...and soon doctor and patient discover that knowledge can be dangerous on the dark frontiers of psychoscience.
title: Dirty Little Secret
